name: Dragon Simulator (itch) (Firn)
description:
Welcome to DS, this is a simple project I made to learn unity, you need to understand that this is not a AAA game, it is very performence heavy and buggy. But I think some people might enjoy it. 

In the game, you can fly, walk, breath fire (like me), but also walk on ground (early developement). There is no goal despite doing cool trick shots and look at the ragdolling dragon crash on a tree (SO YES DANI, THERE ARE RAGDOLLS!). Depending on your thougths of the project I might do updates in the future.
